entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
